translation.zh: NETFLIX 原创连续剧

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, did I startle you with holiday cheer
translation.zh:
噢 对不起
我的节日欢呼和亲切问候

translation.en: and good will towards man?
translation.zh: 吓到你了吗？

translation.en: No, I just had this terrible dream that you were a person that existed
translation.zh:
不 我刚做了个可怕的梦
你是一个存在的人

translation.en: and that you were in my room for some reason.
translation.zh: 而且你不知为何出现在我房间

translation.en: And then I woke up and it was true.
translation.zh:
然后我醒来
发现这是真的

translation.en: Do you know what day it is?
translation.zh: 你知道今天是什么日子吗？

translation.en: Oh, shit, is it like our anniversary
translation.zh:
噢 可恶 今天是
那天我忘了跟你说

translation.en: of that one day that I forgot to tell you how annoying you are?
translation.zh: 你有多烦人的周年纪念吗？

translation.en: No, that was July 14th.
translation.zh: 不 那是7月14日

translation.en: You can remember it because it's also Bastille Day.
translation.zh:
你会记得
因为那天也是巴士底日

translation.en: Christ, are you annoying.
translation.zh: 天啊 你真烦人

translation.en: BoJack, it's Christmas!
translation.zh: 波杰克 今天是圣诞节！

translation.en: Well, don't get too excited.
translation.zh: 好 别太兴奋

translation.en: I didn't get you shit. Ha! Shows what you know.
translation.zh:
-我什么都不会送你
-你什么都不知道

translation.en: When you were passed out, I used your credit card
translation.zh:
你昏过去时
我用了你的信用卡

translation.en: to buy me this new hat.
translation.zh: 替我买了这顶新帽子

translation.en: Merry Christmas to me.
translation.zh: 祝我圣诞快乐

translation.en: It looks exactly like your old hat.
translation.zh: 这看起来完全像你的旧帽子

translation.en: Yeah, it's my favorite kind of hat. Thanks, buddy!
translation.zh:
对 这是我最爱的那种帽子
谢了 兄弟！

translation.en: Okay, great, Christmas transaction complete.
translation.zh:
好 太棒了
圣诞节过完了

translation.en: Please leave now.
translation.zh: 现在请离开

translation.en: Or we could watch Sabrina's Christmas Wish.
translation.zh:
或者我们可以看
《赛宾娜的圣诞愿望》

translation.en: Hard pass.
translation.zh:
-才不要
-什么？

translation.en: What? Come on, you love Horsin' Around.
translation.zh: 好啦 你爱《鬼马奶爸》

translation.en: Yeah, but I always skip the Christmas ones.
translation.zh: 对 但我总是跳过圣诞节

translation.en: Because the themes of family and togetherness
translation.zh: 因为家庭和亲密无间的主题

translation.en: are a chilling reminder of your own isolation?
translation.zh:
令人寒心地提醒了
你自己的孤独吗？

translation.en: No, but thank you for that.
translation.zh: 不 但谢谢你这么说

translation.en: Todd, special holiday episodes are always stupid.
translation.zh: 托德 特别节日影集总是很蠢

translation.en: Cynical cash grabs by greedy corporations
translation.zh: 贪婪的公司想捞一票

translation.en: looking to squeeze a few extra Nielsen points
translation.zh:
期待用多愁善感的空话
从浆糊脑袋的白痴身上

translation.en: out of sentimental claptrap for mush-brained idiots
translation.zh: 多挤出一点尼尔森收视率

translation.en: who'd rather spend their Christmas watching a fake family on TV
translation.zh:
这些人宁愿把圣诞节团聚时间
花在看电视上的假家庭上

translation.en: than actually trying to have a conversation
translation.zh: 也不愿意真正尝试

translation.en: with their own dumb families.
translation.zh: 和他们自己的家人对话

translation.en: I like it when people on TV hug each other.
translation.zh: 我喜欢电视上的人彼此拥抱

translation.en: Oh, come on, buddy!
translation.zh: 好啦 兄弟！

translation.en: It's Christmas!
translation.zh: 今天是圣诞节！

translation.en: Fine, if it'll make you shut up, I begrudgingly acquiesce
translation.zh:
好 如果这会让你闭嘴
我勉强默许

translation.en: to a half-hour of shared holiday acknowledgment,
translation.zh: 半小时分享节日

translation.en: but only because I get a residual check
translation.zh:
不过这只是因为
每次有人看我拍的电视剧

translation.en: every time somebody watches one of them.
translation.zh: 我就会有钱入账

translation.en: Hurray! Begrudging acquiescence!
translation.zh: 勉强默许万岁！
芝加哥开幕夜

translation.en: ♪ Without a home or a family tree ♪
translation.zh: 菲梅朵小学 儿童保护服务

translation.en: ♪ Horsin' Around ♪♪
translation.zh: 《鬼马奶爸》

translation.en: [narrator] Horsin' Around is filmed before a live studio audience.
translation.zh:
《鬼马奶爸》在
现场观众面前的摄影棚拍摄

translation.en: Eggs sunny side up, just like you like 'em.
translation.zh:
单煎一面的鸡蛋
你喜欢的烹调方式

translation.en: The hash has been thoroughly browned
translation.zh: 马铃薯饼也煎好了

translation.en: and your pancakes have extra chocolate chips.
translation.zh:
还有你的煎饼
有额外的巧克力碎片

translation.en: Any questions?
translation.zh:
-有任何问题吗？
-只有一个

translation.en: Just the one. Who are you and what have you done with Olivia?
translation.zh:
你是谁
还有你对奥莉维亚做了什么？

translation.en: Can't a sweet, young, lovable orphan
translation.zh:
我不能当一个温柔 年轻
可爱的孤儿

translation.en: make breakfast for her favorite horse
translation.zh: 替她最爱的马儿做早餐

translation.en: without having ulterior motives?
translation.zh: 而没有别有用心的动机吗？

translation.en: You're right, I'm sorry, Olivia, this is very sweet.
translation.zh:
你说得对 对不起
奥莉维亚 这真的很贴心

translation.en: And speaking of ulterior motives...
translation.zh: 说到别有用心的动机

translation.en: Well, I walked into that one.
translation.zh: 好 我居然上当了

translation.en: That cute leather jacket I like is on sale at the galleria.
translation.zh:
我喜欢的那件
可爱的皮外套在大特价

translation.en: As always, all roads lead to a cute leather jacket.
translation.zh:
照例 所有道路都通往
一件可爱的皮外套

translation.en: I gotta say, I've never understood
translation.zh: 我得说 我从不了解

translation.en: the appeal of fashionable clothing.
translation.zh: 流行服饰的吸引力

translation.en: Um, that's the understatement of the century.
translation.zh: 别那么老土

translation.en: Trends come and go,
translation.zh: 潮流来来去去

translation.en: but give me a pair of sensible winter socks,
translation.zh: 但给我一双实用的冬袜

translation.en: and for years to come, I can keep my tootsies toasty.
translation.zh:
未来几年
我都可以替我的脚保暖

translation.en: Haven't you kids ever heard that it's better to give than to receive?
translation.zh:
你们这两个孩子没听过
施比受更有福吗？

translation.en: Well, by that logic, isn't giving you the opportunity
translation.zh:
好 以那个逻辑来说
我给你这个机会

translation.en: to give me a leather jacket really the best gift of all?
translation.zh:
送我一件皮外套
不就是最棒的礼物了吗？

translation.en: Well, I've heard of a one jacket mind,
translation.zh:
好 我听说过什么是
满脑子都是一件外套

translation.en: but this is ridiculous.
translation.zh: 但这样太可笑了

translation.en: "One jacket mind"? What the hell is a one jacket mind?
translation.zh:
“满脑子都是一件外套？”
到底是什么意思？

translation.en: I just want to look good
translation.zh: 我只想骑在乔伊色拉托加的

translation.en: when I'm on the back of Joey Saratoga's motorcycle.
translation.zh:
摩托车后座时
看起来很漂亮

translation.en: Besides, I've never had a Christmas before
translation.zh: 此外 我以前从没过过圣诞节

translation.en: and I want to make sure this one's really special.
translation.zh:
我想确保这个圣诞节
真的很特别

translation.en: Hold on, you mean to tell me you've never had a Christmas
translation.zh:
等等 你是想告诉我
你在孤儿院

translation.en: at the orphanage? What's a Christ... mas?
translation.zh:
-从没过过圣诞节？
-圣诞节是什么？

translation.en: What's a Christmas?
translation.zh: 圣诞节是什么？

translation.en: Only the most wonderful time of the year.
translation.zh:
没什么了不起的
只不过是全年最美妙的时节

translation.en: You hang up stockings, sing carols,
translation.zh:
你挂上长袜
唱圣诞颂歌

translation.en: and wait up for Santa Claus.
translation.zh: 不睡觉等着看圣诞老人

translation.en: What's a Santa Claus?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人是什么？

translation.en: What's a Santa Claus?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人是什么？

translation.en: Is there an echo in here?
translation.zh: 这里有回音吗？

translation.en: Santa Claus is the best.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人是最棒的

translation.en: He's this jolly old fat man who lives up at the North Pole,
translation.zh:
他是位欢乐的胖爷爷
住在北极

translation.en: and every year he flies all over the world
translation.zh: 而且每年他都飞遍全世界

translation.en: leaving presents for all the good boys and girls.
translation.zh: 送礼物给所有乖男孩和女孩

translation.en: We get presents just for being good?
translation.zh: 我们只要乖乖的就有礼物？

translation.en: That's too much, man.
translation.zh: 太过分了吧 老兄

translation.en: [audience member] That's my favorite line!
translation.zh: 这是我最爱的台词

translation.en: That's right, but you have to be really good
translation.zh: 没错 但你必须真的很乖

translation.en: because Santa Claus is always watching.
translation.zh: 因为圣诞老人总是在看

translation.en: Even when we go to the bathroom?
translation.zh: 甚至我们上厕所时吗？

translation.en: That's too much, man.
translation.zh: 太过分了 老兄

translation.en: [audience member] Yeah, she said it again!
translation.zh: 好 她又说一次！

translation.en: This Santa Claus guy sounds like a real piece of work.
translation.zh:
这个圣诞老人听起来
好像真的不太好搞

translation.en: You kids just wait,
translation.zh: 你们这些孩子们等着瞧

translation.en: this is gonna be the best Christmas you ever had.
translation.zh:
这会是你们过得
最棒的圣诞节

translation.en: So, better than no Christmas?
translation.zh: 所以 比没圣诞节更好？

translation.en: A thousand times better.
translation.zh: 好一千倍

translation.en: A thousand times zero is still zero.
translation.zh: 零的一千倍还是零

translation.en: Ethan, you want those winter socks?
translation.zh: 伊森 你想要冬袜吗？

translation.en: Do I?
translation.zh: 可以吗？

translation.en: Then don't be such a wise guy over here, eh?
translation.zh: 那就别当这么聪明的人吧？
利伯瑞托与合伙人公司

translation.en: Is Mr. Liberatore in?
translation.zh: 利伯瑞托先生在吗？

translation.en: Look at you all business.
translation.zh: 看你一副公事公办的样子

translation.en: No, "Hello, Tracy.
translation.zh: 没有“你好 崔西

translation.en: Your hair looks nice, Tracy.
translation.zh: 你的头发很好看 崔西

translation.en: How's your mother, Tracy?"
translation.zh: 你的母亲好吗 崔西？”

translation.en: Ah, sorry, Trace, I'm just trying to get ahead
translation.zh:
对不起 崔西
我只是想抓点紧

translation.en: so I don't have to work on Christmas this year.
translation.zh: 这样我今年圣诞节就不必工作

translation.en: Since when do you care about workin' on Christmas?
translation.zh:
你从何时起在乎
在圣诞节工作？

translation.en: Are those little rug rats making you soft?
translation.zh: 那些小淘气让你软化了吗？

translation.en: No way, I'm still the top earner at this firm.
translation.zh:
不可能
我还是这间公司最赚钱的人

translation.en: I'll buzz Mr. Liberatore and let him know you're here.
translation.zh:
我会打给利伯瑞托
告诉他你在这里

translation.en: I know he wanted to check your progress on the Manzanita briefs.
translation.zh:
我知道他想确认
你在曼萨尼塔简报的进度

translation.en: Tracy, if you wanted to see my briefs,
translation.zh: 崔西 如果你想看我的简报

translation.en: all you had to do was ask.
translation.zh: 你只要问就行

translation.en: Why, if I didn't know any better, I'd say you were flirting with me.
translation.zh:
哎呀 如果我不了解你
我会说你在挑逗我

translation.en: [audience member] Kiss her!
translation.zh: 吻她！

translation.en: Mr. Liberatore is gonna make me come in on Christmas, I can feel it.
translation.zh:
利伯瑞托先生会逼我
在圣诞节来 我感觉得到

translation.en: You know, he has got to be the meanest, snootiest, penny-pinchingest...
translation.zh:
他一定是最坏 最傲慢
最吝啬的人

translation.en: And he's right behind me, isn't he?
translation.zh: 他就在我背后 不是吗？

translation.en: [Mr. Liberatore] Actually, I'm listening over the intercom.
translation.zh: 其实我一直从对讲机听到一切

translation.en: I can't say I'm not disappointed.
translation.zh: 我不能说我不失望

translation.en: Time was, I thought you were a go-getter.
translation.zh:
我以前以为
你是进取又勤奋的人

translation.en: Hey, I go, I get.
translation.zh: 嘿 我进取 我勤奋

translation.en: Ever since those orphans moved in,
translation.zh: 自从那些孤儿搬进来

translation.en: you've become awfully distracted.
translation.zh: 你就变得很不专心

translation.en: If you want to be made partner,
translation.zh: 如果你想当合伙人

translation.en: you'll have to show some initiative.
translation.zh: 你必须表现出一点进取心

translation.en: You know, Jacob Goldstein's coming in on Christmas.
translation.zh: 雅各布高斯丁圣诞节会来上班

translation.en: Jacob Goldstein's Jewish! He is?
translation.zh:
-雅各布高斯丁是犹太人
-是吗？

translation.en: The boys at the country club are not gonna like that.
translation.zh: 乡村俱乐部的人不会喜欢这样

translation.en: Anyway, you can spend Christmas morning
translation.zh: 反正你可以和你的小淘气

translation.en: with your little tater tots,
translation.zh: 度过圣诞节早晨

translation.en: but I want you in here by the afternoon.
translation.zh: 但我要你下午过来这里

translation.en: Remember, this is your career we're talking about.
translation.zh: 记住 这可是你的事业

translation.en: It's quiet.
translation.zh: 好安静

translation.en: Too quiet.
translation.zh: 太安静了

translation.en: Go home, Goober!
translation.zh:
-回家 古柏！
-回家 古柏！

translation.en: For your information, I was invited here personally
translation.zh:
告诉你们
我受到马脸男的邀请而来

translation.en: by The Horse himself to sprinkle a little holiday magic
translation.zh:
在你们沈闷
没有古柏的人生中

translation.en: into your dull, Gooberless lives.
translation.zh: 洒一点节日魔法

translation.en: Since when does Santa wear sunglasses?
translation.zh:
圣诞老人从何时开始
戴太阳眼镜？

translation.en: I thought it was time old Saint Nick
translation.zh: 我觉得老圣诞老人是时候

translation.en: got a bit of an update, you know what I'm sayin'?
translation.zh:
现代化一点了
你们知道我在说什么吧？

translation.en: Let me guess, instead of "Ho, Ho, Ho,"
translation.zh:
让我猜
不是“呵 呵 呵”

translation.en: it's "Yo, Yo, Yo."
translation.zh: 而是“唷 唷 唷”

translation.en: And, uh, maybe later I could get you
translation.zh: 也许等一下我可以跟你

translation.en: under the mistletoe-toe-toe?
translation.zh: 在槲寄生下接个吻 吻 吻？

translation.en: I've got three words for you Goober:
translation.zh:
我有三个字送你
古柏

translation.en: no, no, no.
translation.zh: 不 不 不

translation.en: [audience member] Kiss her!
translation.zh: 吻她！

translation.en: All right, Sabrina, are you ready for the big surprise?
translation.zh:
好了 赛宾娜
你准备好接受大惊喜了吗？

translation.en: A tree inside the house?
translation.zh: 一棵树放在屋里？

translation.en: Now I've seen everything.
translation.zh: 现在我可大开眼界了

translation.en: And that's not all. Look who came to visit.
translation.zh:
那还不是全部呢
你看是谁来了

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: Go home, Goober.
translation.zh: 回家 古柏

translation.en: No, that's not Goober, it's Santa.
translation.zh:
不 他不是古柏
他是圣诞老人

translation.en: Please, I'd recognize that cologne anywhere.
translation.zh:
拜托 我到哪里都认得出
那个古龙水的味道

translation.en: You had to wear the cologne.
translation.zh: 你一定要擦古龙水啊

translation.en: [Todd] Ha, classic Goober.
translation.zh: 经典的古柏

translation.en: Are you gonna keep talking? 'Cause I'll just pause it.
translation.zh:
你要继续讲话吗？
因为我要暂停了

translation.en: Okay, okay, I won't talk.
translation.zh: 好 好 我不说话

translation.en: You're getting into it, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你越看越起劲儿了 不是吗？

translation.en: No, why are we doing this?
translation.zh: 不 我们为什么要做这种事？

translation.en: You have to watch cheesy old holiday specials on Christmas,
translation.zh:
你必须在圣诞节
观赏低劣的节日特辑

translation.en: it's tradition. Why? They're never any good.
translation.zh:
-这是传统
-为什么？从来就不好看

translation.en: Things don't become traditions because they're good, BoJack.
translation.zh:
不是因为好看而变成传统
波杰克

translation.en: They become good because they're traditions.
translation.zh: 因为是传统才变得好看

translation.en: You know, you can't just make yourself sound smart
translation.zh:
你知道
你把事情倒着说

translation.en: by saying things backwards.
translation.zh: 不会让你听起来很聪明

translation.en: Oh, I can't, can't I?
translation.zh: 噢 不行 行不？

translation.en: Still don't believe I let you talk me into this.
translation.zh:
还是不相信
我让你说服我看这个

translation.en: And I still don't believe Goober
translation.zh: 而我还是不相信古柏

translation.en: ended up molesting all those Laker Girls.
translation.zh: 居然骚扰湖人队的拉拉队女郎

translation.en: Goober did not molest those Laker Girls,
translation.zh:
古柏没骚扰
湖人队的拉拉队女郎

translation.en: the actor who played Goober molested those Laker Girls.
translation.zh:
是饰演古柏的演员
骚扰湖人队的拉拉队女郎

translation.en: Hey, this is nice, right?
translation.zh: 嘿 这样很好 对吧？

translation.en: No, shut up.
translation.zh: 不 闭嘴

translation.en: All right, all right, little lady, you got me.
translation.zh:
好啦 好啦
小淑女 你逮到我了

translation.en: But, uh, listen, I'm actually workin' for Santa
translation.zh:
但是 听着
我其实是替圣诞老人工作

translation.en: as one of his helpers, so anything you say to me
translation.zh:
因为我是他的一名帮手
所以你对我说的任何话

translation.en: I can relay to the big man himself.
translation.zh: 我都可以转达给我老板

translation.en: Is there anything you want to ask Santa for?
translation.zh:
你有任何东西
想请圣诞老人送你吗？

translation.en: Now's your chance, anything you want.
translation.zh:
现在是你的机会
你想要任何东西都行

translation.en: Well, I guess what I really want is a personalized pencil set.
translation.zh:
我猜我真正想要的是
一套自己的铅笔套装

translation.en: A pencil set? Sabrina!
translation.zh: 一个铅笔套装？赛宾娜！

translation.en: At the orphanage, I always had to share everything.
translation.zh:
在孤儿院
我总是得分享一切

translation.en: If I pencils that had my name on them,
translation.zh: 如果我有上面有我名字的铅笔

translation.en: everyone would know, "Hey, these pencils are Sabrina's!
translation.zh:
每个人都会知道：
“这些铅笔是赛宾娜的！

translation.en: Hands off, bumsky!"
translation.zh: 别碰 粗鲁鬼”

translation.en: I don't think you're getting this whole Christmas thing.
translation.zh: 你可能还不太了解圣诞节

translation.en: You can ask for anything, you don't have to be shy.
translation.zh:
你可以要求任何东西
不必害羞的

translation.en: Well, I guess I wouldn't mind a Pretty Pony Princess play set.
translation.zh:
好 我猜我不介意有一套
漂亮小马公主游戏套装

translation.en: Now you're thinking Christmas.
translation.zh: 这样还比较像圣诞节的礼物

translation.en: Keep going, what do you want more than anything else in the world?
translation.zh:
继续想下去
你在这世上最想要的是什么？

translation.en: I can ask Santa for anything?
translation.zh:
我可以向圣诞老人
要求任何东西吗？

translation.en: Anything at all.
translation.zh: 任何东西都行

translation.en: And if I'm good, Santa has to give it to me?
translation.zh:
如果我很乖
圣诞老人就会送给我吗？

translation.en: That's the deal, as long as you're good,
translation.zh:
就是这样
只要你很乖

translation.en: all your Christmas dreams will come true.
translation.zh: 你所有的圣诞梦想都会成真

translation.en: Okay, I know what I want.
translation.zh: 好 我知道我想要什么了

translation.en: Santa, I want my Mommy and Daddy to come back.
translation.zh:
圣诞老人
我要我的爸妈回来

translation.en: This is gonna be the best Christmas ever.
translation.zh: 这会是最棒的圣诞节

translation.en: [Todd] Look how sad you are,
translation.zh: 看你有多伤心

translation.en: you're a really good actor.
translation.zh: 你真的是一个很好的演员

translation.en: Are you gonna interrupt every five minutes?
translation.zh: 你每五分钟都要打断一次吗？

translation.en: Because I will ask you to leave.
translation.zh: 因为我会请你离开

translation.en: And spend Christmas by yourself?
translation.zh: 然后你独自度过圣诞节吗？

translation.en: No one should be alone on Christmas.
translation.zh: 没有人该在圣诞节独自一人

translation.en: Did we learn nothing from John McClane in "Die Hard"?
translation.zh:
从《虎胆龙威》的约翰麦克连
身上 我们什么都没学到吗？

translation.en: John McClane was alone on Christmas, that's how he saved the day.
translation.zh:
约翰麦克连在圣诞节独自一人
他就是这样才拯救了大家

translation.en: He wasn't alone, he had that cop helping him,
translation.zh:
他不是独自一人
他有那个警察帮他

translation.en: the dad from Family Matters.
translation.zh: 《凡人琐事》里那个爸爸

translation.en: That wasn't the dad from Family Matters, it was just the same actor.
translation.zh:
他不是《凡人琐事》里那个
爸爸 只是同一个演员而已

translation.en: I'm pretty sure it's supposed to be the same character,
translation.zh:
我相当确定
这应该是相同的角色

translation.en: they're both cops.
translation.zh: 他们都是警察

translation.en: Yeah, but one was a cop in Los Angeles and the other was a cop in Chicago.
translation.zh:
对 但一个是洛杉矶的警察
另一个则是芝加哥的警察

translation.en: Maybe he moved.
translation.zh: 也许他搬家了

translation.en: He didn't move, they had different names!
translation.zh:
他没搬家
他们有不同的名字！

translation.en: Witness Protection.
translation.zh: 证人保护计划

translation.en: Hey, this is nice, right?
translation.zh: 嘿 这样很好 对吧？

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Oh, Charles Krauthammer, you have done it again.
translation.zh:
噢 查尔斯柯汉默
你又来了

translation.en: Yes, Mr. Liberatore.
translation.zh: 是 利伯瑞托先生

translation.en: Of course, Mr. Liberatore, I'll get right on it, sir.
translation.zh:
当然 利伯瑞托先生
我马上就去办 先生

translation.en: Yeesh, I've heard of being a work horse,
translation.zh:
哎呀 我知道俗语说
“像马一样辛苦工作”

translation.en: but this is ridiculous.
translation.zh: 但这也太荒唐了

translation.en: I just hate that he's making you work on Christmas.
translation.zh: 我真讨厌他逼你在圣诞节工作

translation.en: What is this, Communist Russia?
translation.zh: 这是怎样 俄共吗？

translation.en: I know, it's a bummer,
translation.zh: 我知道 真令人失望

translation.en: but we can find other times to be together.
translation.zh: 但我们可以找其他时间相聚

translation.en: Hey, maybe I'll chaperone your prom.
translation.zh:
嘿 也许我会陪你
去你的毕业舞会

translation.en: I can meet all your friends,
translation.zh: 我可以认识你所有的朋友

translation.en: talk you up to this Joey Saratoga fella,
translation.zh: 跟这个乔伊色拉托加聊一聊

translation.en: maybe even take a spin on the dance floor.
translation.zh: 也许甚至在舞池秀一下舞技

translation.en: You know, back in my day,
translation.zh: 你知道 在我年轻的时候

translation.en: I could really bust the regular move.
translation.zh: 我的舞技其实还不赖

translation.en: Well, just got done shoveling the walk!
translation.zh: 好 刚铲完人行道的雪

translation.en: I'm being really good just so there's no confusion for Santa
translation.zh:
我一直很乖
这样圣诞老人就不会困惑

translation.en: over whether or not he should make my Christmas wish come true.
translation.zh:
他是不是应该
让我的圣诞节愿望成真

translation.en: Santa, if you're listening, I'm Sabrina!
translation.zh:
圣诞老人 如果你在听
我是赛宾娜！

translation.en: Sabrina, I'm glad you're getting into the Christmas spirit,
translation.zh:
赛宾娜 我很高兴
你充满了圣诞节精神

translation.en: but, you know, bringing your parents back
translation.zh:
但是 你知道
让你爸妈回来

translation.en: is a pretty tall order.
translation.zh: 是相当困难的任务

translation.en: Not for Santa.
translation.zh: 对圣诞老人来说不是

translation.en: Santa can do anything,
translation.zh: 圣诞老人能做任何事

translation.en: just as long as I believe, right, guys?
translation.zh: 只要我相信 对吧 各位？

translation.en: You wanna handle this one?
translation.zh:
你想处理一下
这个情况吗？

translation.en: Sabrina, there are some things even Santa can't do.
translation.zh:
赛宾娜 有些事
甚至连圣诞老人也做不到

translation.en: Okay, I get what's happening.
translation.zh: 好吧 我知道怎么回事了

translation.en: You're trying to make me think
translation.zh: 你想让我认为

translation.en: Santa won't bring me my Mommy and Daddy
translation.zh:
圣诞老人不会带回
我的妈妈和爸爸

translation.en: so that when he does, I'll be even more surprised.
translation.zh:
这样当他做到时
我甚至会更惊喜

translation.en: Just when I thought Christmas couldn't get any more magical.
translation.zh:
就在我以为圣诞节
已经神奇到不行的时候

translation.en: See you later!
translation.zh: 待会儿见！

translation.en: I've heard of great Christmas expectations,
translation.zh: 我听过很棒的圣诞节期望

translation.en: but this is ridiculous.
translation.zh: 但这太荒谬了

translation.en: Now no matter what Santa brings,
translation.zh: 现在不管圣诞老人带什么来

translation.en: she'll go from "reindeer" to "reindon't."
translation.zh: 她会从“驯鹿”变成“寻空”

translation.en: What are we gonna do?
translation.zh: 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: Horse, maybe you should tell her that her parents aren't coming.
translation.zh:
也许你应该告诉她
她的爸妈不会来

translation.en: I can't do that, she'll never believe in Santa Claus again.
translation.zh:
我不能这么做
她绝不会再相信圣诞老人了

translation.en: And we're sure Santa can't bring people back from the dead?
translation.zh:
我们确定圣诞老人不会
让人死而复活吗？

translation.en: On Dancer, on Prancer, on Necromancer?
translation.zh: 靠舞舞 靠跳跳 靠巫师吗？

translation.en: I'm thinkin' no.
translation.zh: 我想不行吧

translation.en: Oh, my God, I got it.
translation.zh: 噢 我的天啊 我想到了

translation.en: Maybe if we can trick her into being bad,
translation.zh: 也许如果我们可以哄骗她不乖

translation.en: she'll think Santa's mad at her.
translation.zh: 她就会认为圣诞老人对她生气

translation.en: That way, when Christmas comes and her parents don't show up,
translation.zh:
那样当圣诞节来了
她的爸妈也不会出现

translation.en: she'll just think it's her own fault.
translation.zh: 她只会认为这是她自己的错

translation.en: Brilliant! She'll still believe in Santa,
translation.zh: 太棒了！她还会相信圣诞老人

translation.en: plus she'll be extra well-behaved for the whole year
translation.zh: 加上她一整年都会格外守规矩

translation.en: so she doesn't blow it again.
translation.zh: 这样她才不会再搞砸

translation.en: Hold on, you kids want me to trick Sabrina into being bad
translation.zh:
等等 你们要我
哄骗赛宾娜不乖

translation.en: just so she won't stop believing Santa?
translation.zh:
这样她就不会
停止相信圣诞老人？

translation.en: Never in a million years would I resort to something so low.
translation.zh:
打死我也不会采取
这么低劣的办法

translation.en: No, we better keep brainstorming
translation.zh: 不 我们最好继续脑力激荡

translation.en: because I am definitely not doing that idea.
translation.zh: 因为我绝对不做这种事

translation.en: How desperate do you think I am?
translation.zh: 你们以为我有多绝望？

translation.en: You are really scraping the bottom of the barrel with that one.
translation.zh: 你们真是不得已才会想到这个

translation.en: No, I will clearly not be pursuing that line of action.
translation.zh: 不 我显然不会做这种事

translation.en: No way, no how.
translation.zh: 不管怎样都不可能

translation.en: So, you want me to sit here and watch the cookies
translation.zh:
所以 你要我坐在这里
看着饼干

translation.en: but not eat them?
translation.zh: 但不准吃吗？

translation.en: This seems like a trick.
translation.zh: 这似乎像一个阴谋

translation.en: [audience member] He's doing the thing he said he wasn't gonna do!
translation.zh:
他在做他说过
自己不会做的事

translation.en: These cookies are for Santa.
translation.zh: 这些饼干要给圣诞老人

translation.en: If anyone eats them, he'll be really mad.
translation.zh:
如果任何人吃掉
他就会真的很生气

translation.en: I need you to guard them.
translation.zh: 我需要你看好饼干

translation.en: It's a very important job.
translation.zh: 这是很重要的工作

translation.en: Well, I guess it is about time
translation.zh: 好 我猜现在是时候

translation.en: I start earning my keep around here.
translation.zh:
开始发挥
我在这个家的作用了

translation.en: I knew I could count on you.
translation.zh: 我就知道我可以信赖你

translation.en: Remember, no matter what, don't eat these delicious,
translation.zh:
记住 不管怎样
别吃这些好吃

translation.en: home made, fresh out of the oven,
translation.zh: 手工制作 刚出炉

translation.en: warm, gooey, chocolate chip delights.
translation.zh:
热呼呼 甜蜜蜜的
巧克力碎片饼干

translation.en: I'll leave you here alone... with these cookies...
translation.zh:
我会把你独自留在这里
和这些饼干

translation.en: which are delicious.
translation.zh: 饼干很好吃

translation.en: Okay, cookies, it's just you and me.
translation.zh:
好 饼干
只剩下你们和我了

translation.en: Ooh, they look so yummy.
translation.zh: 噢 看起来好好吃

translation.en: What would Mommy and Daddy say?
translation.zh: 妈和爸会怎么说？

translation.en: "Sabrina, I'm your Daddy and I say, 'Don't eat the cookies!'"
translation.zh:
“赛宾娜 我是你爸
我说：‘别吃饼干！’”

translation.en: "Listen to your Father, honey, he knows what's best."
translation.zh:
“听你爸的话 甜心
他知道什么是最好的”

translation.en: Okay, Mommy and Daddy, I love you.
translation.zh:
好 妈妈和爸爸
我爱你们

translation.en: I don't think she's taking the bait.
translation.zh: 我不认为她上钩了

translation.en: That's because you didn't put any milk out.
translation.zh: 那是因为你没放牛奶

translation.en: You can't have cookies without milk.
translation.zh: 你不能吃饼干时不喝牛奶

translation.en: That's like Wang without the Chung.
translation.zh:
这就像黄钟合唱团
黄少了钟是不行的

translation.en: Any chance she'll crack?
translation.zh: 她有机会破戒吗？

translation.en: I'd say your odds are about as good
translation.zh: 我会说你的机率就像

translation.en: as a democrat being elected president.
translation.zh: 民主党选上总统那么小

translation.en: Yeesh, I've heard of "lookie, lookie, don't eat the cookie,"
translation.zh:
哎呀 我听过
“看啊 看啊 别吃饼干啊”

translation.en: but this is ridiculous.
translation.zh: 但这太荒谬了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎样？

translation.en: You guys got any other bright ideas?
translation.zh: 你们还有其他好点子吗？

translation.en: Maybe I should go eat the cookies?
translation.zh: 也许我应该去吃饼干？

translation.en: Well, if she's not gonna, somebody should.
translation.zh:
如果她不吃
有人该吃吧

translation.en: [Olivia] Oh, my God, it's Christmas! [Ethan] Oh, it's Christmas!
translation.zh:
-噢 天啊 今天是圣诞节
-噢 今天是圣诞节！

translation.en: Yes, sensible winter socks! You knew!
translation.zh:
好 有感觉的冬袜！
你知道！

translation.en: Ooh, what could this be?
translation.zh: 噢 这会是什么呢？

translation.en: Well, I wanted to make sure you look really cool
translation.zh: 我想确保你坐在摩托车后座

translation.en: on the back of that motorcycle.
translation.zh: 看起来真的很酷

translation.en: You didn't! You didn't!
translation.zh: 不会吧 不会吧！

translation.en: You didn't.
translation.zh: 你真的没买

translation.en: Motorcycle crashes are one of the leading causes of brain injury.
translation.zh:
摩托车车祸
是脑部受伤的主因之一

translation.en: If Joey Saratoga doesn't care about this,
translation.zh:
如果乔伊色拉托加
不在乎这个小脑瓜

translation.en: then Joey Saratoga doesn't care about you.
translation.zh: 那乔伊色拉托加就不在乎你

translation.en: Wow, this present shows you really care,
translation.zh: 这个礼物表示你真的在乎

translation.en: so in a way it's even cooler than a new leather jacket.
translation.zh:
所以 在某方面来说 这甚至
比一件新皮外套更酷

translation.en: Take it from me, being safe is totally radical.
translation.zh:
听我的话
安全是最基本的

translation.en: Is this my present?
translation.zh: 这是我的礼物吗？

translation.en: It's a Pretty Pony Princess play set, just like you asked for.
translation.zh:
这是漂亮小马公主游戏套装
就像你要求的

translation.en: Is that it?
translation.zh: 就这样吗？

translation.en: Well, it's pretty cool.
translation.zh: 这相当酷啊

translation.en: She comes with a tiara and everything.
translation.zh: 她还有头饰各种配件呢

translation.en: Oh, okay.
translation.zh: 噢 好吧

translation.en: And cue the waterworks in 30, 29, 28...
translation.zh:
她就快哭了
倒数30 29 28

translation.en: ...four, three, two...
translation.zh: 四 三 二

translation.en: and...
translation.zh: 然后是…

translation.en: Hey, what's this?
translation.zh: 嘿 这是什么？

translation.en: A letter? Who could this be from?
translation.zh:
赛宾娜 -一封信？谁寄的呢？
-打开来 赛宾娜

translation.en: Open it, Sabrina.
translation.zh:
-一封信？谁寄的呢？
-打开来 赛宾娜

translation.en: What does it say?
translation.zh: 上面写什么？

translation.en: How should I know? I can't read.
translation.zh:
我怎么会知道？
我又不识字

translation.en: "Dear Sabrina, this is a letter from your parents.
translation.zh:
“亲爱的赛宾娜
这是你爸妈写的信

translation.en: Even though we can't be with you on Christmas,
translation.zh: 即使我们不能和你过圣诞节

translation.en: we're in heaven looking down on you
translation.zh: 我们在天堂看着你

translation.en: and we want you to know we love you very much.
translation.zh: 我们要你知道我们非常爱你

translation.en: You are a good girl and we are very proud of you.
translation.zh:
你是个乖女孩
我们非常以你为傲

translation.en: Love, Your Mommy and Daddy."
translation.zh: 爱你的妈妈和爸爸”

translation.en: Isn't that great, Sabrina?
translation.zh: 这不是很棒吗 赛宾娜？

translation.en: A letter from your Mom and Dad.
translation.zh: 你爸妈写信给你了

translation.en: -No, that's not what I asked for. -Sabrina--
translation.zh:
-不 这不是我要的
-赛宾娜

translation.en: I didn't want a stupid letter, I wanted my Mommy and Daddy.
translation.zh:
我不要一封蠢信
我要我爸妈

translation.en: I know you're upset, but--
translation.zh: 我知道你很伤心 但是

translation.en: I hate this.
translation.zh: 我恨这个

translation.en: I hate Santa Claus and I hate trees
translation.zh:
我恨圣诞老人
我恨树

translation.en: and I hate you and I hate Christmas!
translation.zh:
我恨你
我恨圣诞节！

translation.en: Was it something I said?
translation.zh: 因为我说了什么吗？

translation.en: Why would it be something Ethan said?
translation.zh: 为什么是因为伊森说了什么？

translation.en: No, that's the joke, it wasn't something Ethan said,
translation.zh:
不 那是笑话
不是因为伊森说了什么

translation.en: that's why it's funny.
translation.zh: 所以才好笑

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Can I come in?
translation.zh: 我可以进来吗？

translation.en: Even if I say no,
translation.zh: 即使我说不

translation.en: it's not like anyone ever listens to what I want.
translation.zh: 也没有人听我说想要什么

translation.en: Sabrina, I really screwed things up.
translation.zh: 赛宾娜 我真的搞砸了

translation.en: I got so excited trying to make you excited,
translation.zh: 我如此迫切地想让你高兴

translation.en: I forgot the true meaning of Christmas.
translation.zh: 我忘了圣诞节的真正意义

translation.en: Christmas isn't about getting everything you want.
translation.zh:
圣诞节不是关于
得到你想要的一切

translation.en: It's about being around the people that care about you.
translation.zh: 而是关于留在关心你的人身边

translation.en: I did everything right.
translation.zh: 我表现得很乖

translation.en: Why wouldn't Santa Claus want me to be happy?
translation.zh: 为什么圣诞老人不让我快乐？

translation.en: I'm sure he does, he just--
translation.zh: 我确定他很想 他只是

translation.en: Santa Claus works in mysterious ways.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人做事很神秘

translation.en: It's like when I make you eat vegetables.
translation.zh: 这就像当我逼你吃蔬菜

translation.en: Sure, they taste yucky,
translation.zh: 当然 吃起来不好吃

translation.en: but you have to trust that I know what's good for you.
translation.zh:
但你必须相信
我知道什么对你好

translation.en: So, Santa Claus made my parents dead
translation.zh: 所以 圣诞老人让我爸妈死掉

translation.en: because he thinks it's good for me?
translation.zh: 因为他觉得这是为我好？

translation.en: Yeah-- No!
translation.zh: 对 不！

translation.en: Santa Claus didn't make your parents dead.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人没让你爸妈死

translation.en: But he didn't save them either.
translation.zh: 但他也没救他们

translation.en: No, he-- That's not how Santa works.
translation.zh:
不 他
圣诞老人不是这样做的

translation.en: You said Santa Claus is always watching,
translation.zh: 你说圣诞老人一直在看

translation.en: so if he's watching why doesn't he help us?
translation.zh:
所以 如果他在看
他为什么不帮我们？

translation.en: Does he enjoy watching us be sad?
translation.zh: 他喜欢看我们难过吗？

translation.en: Is that how he gets his kicks?
translation.zh:
-他就是以这为乐吗？
-不

translation.en: Are we all just pawns in Santa's sick game?
translation.zh:
我们都只是圣诞老人
变态游戏中的棋子吗？

translation.en: What kind of pervert is he?
translation.zh: 他是怎样的变态？

translation.en: Oh, no, Santa's watching us right now!
translation.zh:
噢 不
圣诞老人现在正看着我们！

translation.en: I'm sorry, Santa!
translation.zh: 对不起 圣诞老人！

translation.en: I didn't mean it.
translation.zh: 我不是故意的

translation.en: Please don't hurt the people I love.
translation.zh: 请别伤害我爱的人

translation.en: No, Sabrina, Santa Claus isn't real.
translation.zh:
不 赛宾娜
圣诞老人不是真的

translation.en: -What? -[audience groans]
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: He's a lie that grownups made up because we like to believe that
translation.zh:
他是一个大人虚构的谎言
因为我们想相信

translation.en: there's an order to the universe
translation.zh: 宇宙有一种秩序

translation.en: and that good behavior will lead to happiness,
translation.zh: 好行为会导致幸福

translation.en: but the fact is that just isn't true. [audience member] What?
translation.zh:
-但事实上那不是真的
-什么？

translation.en: You can't be good
translation.zh: 你不能只因为你认为

translation.en: just because you think some fat guy in a red suit
translation.zh:
某个穿红衣的胖子
会送你礼物

translation.en: is gonna bring you presents.
translation.zh: 就当个好孩子

translation.en: You have to be good just to be good. That's all there is.
translation.zh:
你必须从心里就想当个好孩子
就是这样

translation.en: Whoa. Look, I don't know why things happen,
translation.zh:
听着 我不知道
为什么有些事会发生

translation.en: I don't know why some people get everything
translation.zh:
我不知道为什么
有些人得到一切

translation.en: and some people are orphans.
translation.zh: 有些人就是孤儿

translation.en: All I know is I spent last Christmas alone at my office.
translation.zh:
我只知道我去年圣诞节
独自在我的办公室度过

translation.en: I didn't get a tree,
translation.zh: 我没得到一棵树

translation.en: I didn't put up any decorations or sing carols,
translation.zh:
我没放任何装饰
或唱颂歌

translation.en: and I didn't try to get any little girls to believe in Santa Claus.
translation.zh:
我没有想让任何小女孩
相信圣诞老人

translation.en: Sabrina, you and Olivia and Ethan
translation.zh:
赛宾娜
你和奥莉维亚和伊森

translation.en: are the best things that have ever happened to me,
translation.zh:
出现在我生活中 是我这辈子
所发生过的最好的事

translation.en: and if it took your parents dying
translation.zh: 如果你爸妈死掉

translation.en: for you to be part of my life, well, then I'm glad your parents died.
translation.zh:
你才能成为我生命的一部分
那我很高兴你爸妈死掉

translation.en: Oh, you don't mean that.
translation.zh: 噢 你不是说真的

translation.en: No, I do, I'm glad your parents are dead
translation.zh:
不 我说真的
我很高兴你爸妈死了

translation.en: and are never coming back.
translation.zh: 而且绝不会回来

translation.en: Well, when you put it that way, I guess I am, too.
translation.zh:
当你这么说
我猜我也一样

translation.en: I know that sometimes I make a mess of this whole thing,
translation.zh: 我知道我有时候搞砸整件事

translation.en: a horse raising three human kids while also
translation.zh:
一匹马抚养三个人类小孩
同时兼顾工作

translation.en: juggling work and trying to have a love life thing,
translation.zh:
一匹马抚养三个人类小孩
同时兼顾工作 并且设法让这个家充满爱
但是还有一个礼物没给你呢

translation.en: but there's one more present.
translation.zh:
并且设法让这个家充满爱
但是还有一个礼物没给你呢

translation.en: Is it from Santa Claus?
translation.zh: 是圣诞老人送的吗？

translation.en: No, it's from me.
translation.zh: 不 我送的

translation.en: Wow, pencils! What do they say?
translation.zh:
哇 铅笔！
上面写什么？

translation.en: Sound it out.
translation.zh: 念出来

translation.en: Sa... Sab...
translation.zh: “赛…赛…

translation.en: Sabrin...
translation.zh: 赛宾…

translation.en: rine...
translation.zh: 宾

translation.en: rine...
translation.zh: 宾

translation.en: Sab...
translation.zh: 赛

translation.en: Sabrine...
translation.zh: 赛宾

translation.en: Sabrinay.
translation.zh: 赛宾拿

translation.en: Sabrinay.
translation.zh: 赛宾拿”

translation.en: -It says Sabrina. -Oh!
translation.zh: 上面写着赛宾娜

translation.en: I can't bring your Mommy and Daddy back, but as long as I'm around,
translation.zh:
我不能把你的爸妈带回来
但只要有我在

translation.en: you'll always have a place to keep your pencils.
translation.zh: 你就永远有地方放你的铅笔

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: Maybe it's just because I never had a Christmas before,
translation.zh:
也许就是因为我以前没过
过圣诞节

translation.en: but this is the best Christmas I've ever had.
translation.zh: 但这是我有过最棒的圣诞节

translation.en: Me, too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Olivia, Ethan, look what I got!
translation.zh:
奥莉维亚 伊森
看我拿到什么！

translation.en: [Mr. Liberatore] Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Listen, Mr. Liberatore,
translation.zh: 听着 利伯瑞托先生

translation.en: I've given it a lot of thought and I'm not--
translation.zh: 我想了很多 我不要…

translation.en: Well, I'm not comin' in to work today.
translation.zh: 好 我今天不去工作了

translation.en: If I have to choose between my career and the people I care about,
translation.zh:
如果我必须在我的职涯
和我在乎的人之间选择

translation.en: well, then I'm sorry, but I'm putting people first.
translation.zh:
那很抱歉
但我以人优先

translation.en: [Mr. Liberatore] You know, it took guts to call in and tell me that,
translation.zh:
你知道 这需要勇气
才能打来跟我说这些

translation.en: the kind of guts we need on our executive board.
translation.zh:
我们的执行董事会
需要这种勇气

translation.en: If that Scrooge, Jacob Goldstein, wants to work on Christmas,
translation.zh:
如果那个小气的雅各布高斯丁
想在圣诞节工作

translation.en: he can work somewhere else!
translation.zh: 他可以在其他地方工作！

translation.en: [audience member] Fire that Jew!
translation.zh: 开除那个犹太人！

translation.en: I'm making you partner.
translation.zh: 我要让你当合伙人

translation.en: Well, I'm really glad to hear that, Mr. Liberatore.
translation.zh:
好 我真的很高兴听到
你这么说 利伯瑞托先生

translation.en: Now if you'll excuse me,
translation.zh: 现在请恕我失陪

translation.en: I have to go spend Christmas with the people I love.
translation.zh:
我必须去和我爱的人
去过圣诞节

translation.en: Hi, I'm a Pretty Pony Princess.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是漂亮小马公主

translation.en: I'm a pencil.
translation.zh: 我是铅笔

translation.en: Well, I guess everything turned out okay.
translation.zh: 我猜一切结果还算好

translation.en: How'd you get her to come back down?
translation.zh: 你怎么说服她下来的？

translation.en: Let's just say I made her
translation.zh:
我们这么说吧
我向她提出了

translation.en: an offer she couldn't refuse.
translation.zh: 一个她无法拒绝的提议

translation.en: Well, I gotta hand it to you,
translation.zh: 好 我不得不佩服你

translation.en: even though it didn't work,
translation.zh: 即使没有用

translation.en: that letter you wrote was really something.
translation.zh: 你写的那封信真的很不错

translation.en: I didn't write that letter. I thought you wrote that letter.
translation.zh:
我没写那封信
我以为那封信是你写的

translation.en: I didn't write the letter.
translation.zh: 我没写那封信

translation.en: Wasn't me.
translation.zh: 也不是我

translation.en: Then where'd it come from?
translation.zh: 那这封信是从哪来的？

《鬼马奶爸》
祝圣诞快乐！

translation.en: Well, that sucked.
translation.zh: 好 烂透了

translation.en: So the letter was actually from her parents?
translation.zh:
所以那封信
真的是她爸妈写的？

translation.en: Uh, I think it was from Santa.
translation.zh: 我想是来自圣诞老人

translation.en: That's why there was a "ho, ho, ho" voice at the end.
translation.zh:
所以最后才有
“呵 呵 呵”的笑声

translation.en: So in the world of this show, there is a Santa.
translation.zh:
所以在这个节目的世界
的确有圣诞老人存在

translation.en: No, I don't know, we were all on cocaine.
translation.zh:
不 我不知道
我们都吸了可卡因

translation.en: God, I can't believe I spent nine years of my life
translation.zh:
天啊 我不敢相信
我花了我人生的九年

translation.en: making that dumb show.
translation.zh: 拍那个愚蠢的节目

translation.en: It wasn't all dumb, BoJack.
translation.zh: 并不是都很蠢 波杰克

translation.en: The episode where Sabrina had a black friend
translation.zh: 赛宾娜有一个黑人朋友那集

translation.en: really started the conversation about racism.
translation.zh:
真的开启了
关于种族歧视的对话

translation.en: And the episode where Ethan looked directly at a solar eclipse
translation.zh: 还有伊森直视日蚀那集

translation.en: really started the conversation
translation.zh: 真的开启了

translation.en: about not looking directly at a solar eclipse.
translation.zh: 关于别直视日蚀的对话

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Well, anyway, Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 好 反正 圣诞快乐

translation.en: I know, it's really just another day
translation.zh: 我知道 这其实只是

translation.en: in a year full of days, nothing all that special about it
translation.zh:
一整年日子的其中一天
根本没什么特别的

translation.en: other than the significance we give it,
translation.zh: 除了我们赋予的重要性之外

translation.en: but still, I'm glad I got to spend part of the day with you, BoJack.
translation.zh:
不过 我很高兴能在今天和你
一起度过一段时光 波杰克

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-真的？
-对

translation.en: Hey, um, Horsin' Around had eight other Christmas episodes.
translation.zh:
嘿 《鬼马奶爸》
还有另外八集圣诞节特集

translation.en: If you're not doing anything else today, we could watch another one,
translation.zh:
如果你今天没其他事要做
我们可以再看一集

translation.en: I mean, just to see how stupid it is.
translation.zh: 我是说 只是看看有多蠢

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-是啊

translation.en: But don't talk in the middle of it.
translation.zh: 但别在播放时说话

translation.en: -Zip! -You can talk a little bit.
translation.zh:
-已封好！
-你可以说一点

translation.en: -Don't be weird about it. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-别那么夸张
-好

translation.en: Hey, after we watch "Horsin' Around," can we make holiday cookies?
translation.zh:
嘿 我们看完《鬼马奶爸》后
我们可以做节日饼干吗？

translation.en: [BoJack] No.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: -[Todd] Can we sing carols? -[BoJack] No.
translation.zh:
-我们可以唱颂歌吗？
-不行

translation.en: -Can we roast a Christmas goose? -No.
translation.zh:
-我们可以烤圣诞鹅吗？
-不行

translation.en: -Can we play dreidel? -No.
translation.zh:
-我们可以玩陀螺吗？
-不行

translation.en: -Can we get a tree? -No.
translation.zh:
-我们可以买一棵树吗？
-不行

translation.en: -Doesn't have to be a Christmas tree. -Still no.
translation.zh:
-不必一定要是圣诞树
-还是不行

translation.en: -Can we be visited by three spirits? -No.
translation.zh:
-会有三个灵魂来看我们吗？
-不会

translation.en: -Can we be visited by three kings? -No.
translation.zh:
-会有三个国王来看我们吗？
-不会

translation.en: -Can we go outside and make snow angels? -What snow? It's 72 degrees out.
translation.zh:
-我们能去外面堆雪人天使吗
-什么雪？外面摄氏22度

translation.en: -Can we make driveway gravel angels? -No.
translation.zh:
-我们能用车道碎石堆天使吗
-不行

translation.en: -Can we drink eggnog? -No.
translation.zh:
-我们可以喝蛋酒吗？
-不行

translation.en: -Bourbon and eggnog? -No.
translation.zh:
-波本酒和蛋酒？
-不行

translation.en: -What about just bourbon? -Fine.
translation.zh:
-只有波本酒呢？
-好
